pli-tv-bi-vb-pj6:1.17: paṭicodeti → paṭicodesi … ārocesīti (bj, pts1, mr) | na gaṇassa ārocetī”ti → paṭicodesi … ārocesīti (bj, pts1, mr)
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj6:1.23: nevattanā → neva attanā (s1-3) | avassaṭā → avasaṭā (bj, s1-3, pts1) | ti → vajjapaṭicchādikāti (bj, s1-3, pts1) | aññāsiṃ → saññāsiṃ (s2, s3) | pubbevāhaṃ → pubbe vāhaṃ (s1-3)
